title: New OCE Streamer | $20 RP Giveaway @ 50 Followers | Send us your feedback on the stream!

embed.description: NEW STREAM!! | 1 Day Until Official Debut

body:
Hey guys,

Come along and watch for a bit. If you up for it leave some feedback! We want to know how to improve and bring interesting content to you!

Also there will be a $20AUD RP giveaway to one of our first 50 followers on the twitch channel. We have already given away one to our first 20!

Share the stream around a bit if you feel like helping a brother out!!!

Peace! {{summoner:12}}

replies.body: how do u even stream with oce internet?
keeping hamsters are illegal in OCE brah
